feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style variable definitions with light/dark OKLCH theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting root div and loading main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping GameScreen in a full-screen container.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Visual bullet component with glow, core gradient, and trailing effect.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: SVGâ€‘rendered player jet with glow, fuselage, wings, canopy, and thruster effects.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game logic handling state, movement, bullets, animation loop, and controls.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Utility to clamp entity movement within playfield bounds.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Styled playfield container with borders, accents, and grid overlay.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Game overlay UI for start, pause, resume, restart, HUD, and fire control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for the game's client-side state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom arcade-themed color variables, shadows, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, game-specific tokens, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and requirements for a mobile-friendly browser-based jet game.
